title: How to be an author - Quora

response.answer_text: Just write! Doesn’t matter if it’s good or bad. What matters is words on paper. If it’s fictional, do some planning beforehand and just write it out. Do a bit every day. If it’s non-fiction, find something you’re passionate about and interested in and write write write. The rest will work itself out. You can choose between self-publishing, traditional publishing and more, but first, write that book!

if you want to be an author — WRITE. That is the main thing to do. Everything else is extra. Or, at best, it is in support of what you write. You can take classes, read, research, study character development. But you will not be an author unless you actually write. Most of what you start with will be crap. That’s why you do the other stuff — so you’ll know the difference.
